blocks.content: How do I withdraw my gold?
blocks.defaultContent: How do I withdraw my gold?

blocks.content: Pioneering the future of gold-backed digital finance.

blocks.content: Our Mission
blocks.defaultContent: Our Mission

blocks.content: Security First - Your assets are protected by enterprise-grade security.
blocks.defaultContent: Security First - Your assets are protected by enterprise-grade security.

blocks.content: To democratize access to gold ownership and create a seamless bridge between traditional gold assets and modern digital finance. We believe everyone deserves access to the stability and security that gold provides.
blocks.defaultContent: To democratize access to gold ownership and create a seamless bridge between traditional gold assets and modern digital finance. We believe everyone deserves access to the stability and security that gold provides.

blocks.content: Innovation - Continuously improving our platform with cutting-edge technology.
blocks.defaultContent: Innovation - Continuously improving our platform with cutting-edge technology.

blocks.content:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

Information We Collect

We collect personal information you provide during registration, KYC verification, and transactions.

How We Use Your Information

Your information is used to provide services, verify identity, process transactions, and comply with regulations.

Data Security

We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

Third-Party Sharing

We do not sell your personal information. We only share data with partners necessary to provide our services.
blocks.defaultContent:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us.

blocks.defaultContent: Frequently Asked Questions

blocks.defaultContent: Verification Tiers

blocks.content: Corporate - Business registration and beneficial ownership documentation.
blocks.defaultContent: Corporate - Business registration and beneficial ownership documentation.

blocks.content: What is Finatrades?
blocks.defaultContent: What is Finatrades?

blocks.content: Is my gold physically stored?
blocks.defaultContent: Is my gold physically stored?

blocks.content: Yes, all gold is 100% allocated and stored in LBMA-accredited vaults. Your gold is physically segregated and belongs only to you.
blocks.defaultContent: Yes, all gold is physically stored.

blocks.content: Your Gateway to Gold-Backed Digital Finance
blocks.defaultContent: Your Gateway to Gold-Backed Digital Finance

blocks.content: Buy, sell, store, and transfer physical gold seamlessly through our secure digital platform.
blocks.defaultContent: Buy, sell, store, and transfer physical gold seamlessly through our secure digital platform.

blocks.content: Identity Verification
blocks.defaultContent: Identity Verification

blocks.content: Finatrades is a gold-backed digital finance platform that allows you to buy, sell, store, and transfer physical gold through our secure digital platform.
blocks.defaultContent: Finatrades is a gold-backed digital finance platform.

blocks.content: What are the fees?
blocks.defaultContent: What are the fees?

blocks.content: Fees vary by transaction type. All fees are transparently displayed before you confirm any transaction. Storage fees are charged monthly based on your holdings.
blocks.defaultContent: Fees are transparently displayed.

blocks.content: Complete your KYC to unlock all platform features.
blocks.defaultContent: Complete your KYC to unlock all platform features.

blocks.content:
Terms and Conditions

Welcome to Finatrades. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

1. Account Registration

You must be at least 18 years old to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

2. Gold Transactions

All gold transactions are conducted in grams. Prices are based on live market rates plus applicable fees.

3. KYC Requirements

You must complete identity verification to access certain features. This is required by regulatory compliance.

4. Fees

Transaction fees, storage fees, and other charges are disclosed before each transaction.

5. Limitation of Liability

Finatrades is not liable for market price fluctuations or losses arising from gold price changes.
blocks.defaultContent:
Terms and Conditions

Welcome to Finatrades. By using our services, you agree to these terms.

templates.name: Document Expiry Reminder
templates.subject: Your {{document_type}} is expiring soon - Action Required
templates.body:
Document Expiry Notice

Hello {{user_name}},

This is a friendly reminder that your {{document_type}} is expiring on {{expiry_date}}.

Document: {{document_type}}

Days remaining: {{days_remaining}} days

To continue using Finatrades services without interruption, please update your KYC documents before the expiry date.

What you need to do:

  1. Obtain a new valid document
  2. Log in to your Finatrades account
  3. Go to Settings ‚Üí KYC Verification
  4. Upload your new document

Update Documents

If you have already renewed your documents, please disregard this message.

templates.name: BNSL Agreement Signed
templates.subject: Your BNSL Agreement - Plan {{plan_id}}
templates.body:
BNSL Agreement Confirmed

Dear {{user_name}},

Thank you for enrolling in the BNSL (Buy Now Sell Later) Plan. Your signed agreement is attached to this email for your records.

Plan Summary

Plan ID:{{plan_id}}
Gold Sold:{{gold_amount}}g
Tenure:{{tenure_months}} months
Margin Rate:{{margin_rate}}% p.a.
Base Price:${'$'}{{base_price}}
Total Margin:${'$'}{{total_margin}}
Quarterly Payout:${'$'}{{quarterly_payout}}

Important: Please keep this email and the attached PDF for your records. This document confirms your irrevocable sale of gold to Wingold and Metals DMCC.

Signed by: {{signature_name}}

Date: {{signed_date}}

Your quarterly margin payments will be credited to your FinaPay wallet according to the disbursement schedule outlined in your agreement.

View Your Plan
